================Deep Space===============
Requires Unity 2019.4.28 or higher.
==============================

Low poly modular -=Deep Space=-
This pack includes modular sci-fi corridors with elevator system, animated scripted doors and many many many flashing lights.

With this pack you can create different modular sci-fi corridors, living/operating modular rooms, big modular areas with stairs.


Pack Includes:
- modular walls - 10 types;
- room constructor;
- areas constructor;
- modular floors;
- modular elevator (any count of floors);
- flashing lights (operated by scripts);
- animated doors;
- barrel prop;
- box prop;
- lamp, decor elements;
- lights, doors, elevator, cables operating scripts.
==============================


ilonion32@gmail.com
"IL.ranch", 2019-21.
